objectives.en:
Master's exam (15 ECTS) focuses on an applied problem using partly theoretical, partly some other form of expression (depending on the character of the project).  Applied master's exam is accompanied with subjects that proved additional competences for completing the project (15 ECTS).The purpose is to resolve a theological, translation-related, educational or  a religion-related cultural or social problem using disciplinary knowledge and resources.
The purpose is to resolve a religion-related cultural or social problem using disciplinary knowledge and resources.
Master's exam demonstrates the student's ability to use disciplinary knowledge in a creative way and proves the competences of using one's knowledge, presenting the results of the research in a form suitable for the target audience, and of carrying on an independent and group-based research. Master's exam contains a written theoretical overview of the project.
objectives.et:
Magistrieksamis (15EAP) keskendutakse rakenduslikule küsimusele, kasutades osalt akadeemilist, osalt mõnda muud väljendusviisi (sõltuvalt eksami iseloomust).  Rakendusliku magistrieksamiga kaasneb 15 EAP mahus aineid, mis lisavad pädevusi konkreetse eksami teostamiseks. 
Magistrieksam näitab üliõpilase oskust erialaseid teadmisi loovalt kasutada ning tõendab erialaste teadmiste kasutamise, uurimustulemuste sihtgrupile sobivas vormis esitamise ja iseseisva ning grupitöö oskusi. Magistrieksam sisaldab teoreetilist katuspeatükki.

learning_outcomes.en: 1. is able to conduct applied research on a field;
learning_outcomes.et: oskab läbi viia rakenduslikku erialast uurimust;

learning_outcomes.en: 2. is able to present the results in form of an applied project using suitable methods of expression and to interpret them independently in a form of accompanying theoretical text;
learning_outcomes.et: oskab esitada tulemused sobivate väljendusvahendite abil rakendusliku projektina ja seda mõtestava iseseisvalt koostatud teoreetilise saatetekstina;

learning_outcomes.en: 3. is able in an academic discussion to defend the position and reasoning presented in the project;
learning_outcomes.et: suudab akadeemilises diskussioonis kaitsta projektis esitatud seisukohti ja arutluskäiku;

learning_outcomes.en: 4. demonstrates a comprehensive knowledge of a field and is able to discuss expertly about the problems of the field.
learning_outcomes.et: demonstreerib erialaste teadmiste terviklikku tundmist ning arutleb asjatundlikult erialaste probleemide üle.
